questions_and_notes: What exactly is the difference between this and variable and cLitterCwd-Emon? Is one supposed to be "fine" and the other "coarse"?  Is it really necessary to separately account for these if the distinction is model dependent?  Check root name.
cell_methods: area: mean where land time: mean
long_name: Carbon Mass in Coarse Woody Debris
comment: Carbon mass per unit area in woody debris (dead organic matter composed of coarse wood.  It is distinct from litter)
